item.title: CVE-2023-28023|2024-10-21T14:36:00.258Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20webui%20software%20distribution
item.description: A cross site request forgery vulnerability in the BigFix WebUI Software Distribution interface site version 44 and before allows an NMO attacker to access files on server side systems (server machine and all the ones in its network).Â
